abstract: Puerto Ricans are split on White House-backed bill before House of Representatives that would establish independent control board to oversee reboot of island's economy; while some bristle at idea of control board, many others have even greater distrust of political leaders who created fiscal quagmire.

headline.print_headline: Weighted by Debt,  Puerto Ricans  Flinch at Oversight
headline.main: Weighted by Debt, Puerto Ricans Divided Over Federal Oversight

snippet: Congress is taking up a contentious measure to create a federal control board that could end up overseeing the reboot of Puerto Rico’s economy.
lead_paragraph: Congress is taking up a contentious measure to create a federal control board that could end up overseeing the reboot of Puerto Rico’s economy.
